location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 24: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to the Assistant Collector in Charge, Stationery Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell acknowledges the receipt of a box of stationery, which was delivered by HM frigate Cambrian. Hennell states that the box will be forwarded to its destination by the first opportunity.
